Multiply two square matrices (A,B) and a vector (x) in two different ways and benchmark the results. 

The first way (1) is (AB)x and the second (2) is A(Bx).

The github is https://github.com/echang992000/stats230local/

```{r matmul}
install.packages("C:/Users/Eric/Downloads/stats230local",repos=NULL,type="source")
m1=matrix(runif(100),nrow=10)
m2=matrix(runif(100),nrow=10)
m3=matrix(runif(10),nrow=10)
library(stats230local)
library(bench)
lb=bench::mark(matmul(m1,m2,m3,1),matmul(m1,m2,m3,2))
plot(lb)
```
